an7.35:1.1: “Imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna …pe…
an7.35:1.4: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, samadhigaravata, sovacassata, kalyanamittata.
an7.35:1.5: Ime kho, bhante, satta dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an7.35:1.7: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
an7.35:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.35:2.2: “imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
an7.35:2.3: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu attana ca satthugaravo hoti, satthugaravataya ca vannavadi.
an7.35:2.4: Ye canne bhikkhu na satthugarava te ca satthugaravataya samadapeti.
an7.35:2.5: Ye canne bhikkhu satthugarava tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an7.35:2.12: Ye canne bhikkhu na kalyanamitta te ca kalyanamittataya samadapeti.
an7.35:2.13: Ye canne bhikkhu kalyanamitta tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalenati.
an7.35:2.14: Imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
an7.35:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, sariputta, imassa maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanasi.
an7.35:3.3: Idha, sariputta, bhikkhu attana ca satthugaravo hoti, satthugaravataya ca vannavadi.
an7.35:3.4: Ye canne bhikkhu na satthugarava te ca satthugaravataya samadapeti.
an7.35:3.5: Ye canne bhikkhu satthugarava tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalena.
an7.35:3.12: Ye canne bhikkhu na kalyanamitta te ca kalyanamittataya samadapeti.
an7.35:3.13: Ye canne bhikkhu kalyanamitta tesanca vannam bhanati bhutam taccham kalenati.
an7.35:3.14: Imassa kho, sariputta, maya sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
